Container.Name: KerbalSpaceProgram-LMP
Container.Overview:
This container will download and run Luna Multiplayer for Kerbal Space Program (KSP).
Luna Multiplayer is a mod to enable Multiplayer for Kerbal Space Program, you can find more information here: https://github.com/LunaMultiplayer/LunaMultiplayer
**ATTENTION:** Please also don't forget that you have to install the mod for your Client too: https://github.com/LunaMultiplayer/LunaMultiplayer/releases You can get detailed instructions on how to do that on the Wiki: https://github.com/LunaMultiplayer/LunaMultiplayer/wiki
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available and the container will download and install it.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please

Config.Name: Luna Multiplayer Version
Config.Description: Enter the prefered version (valid options are 'latest' and 'nightly' both without quotes).

Config.Name: UDP - GamePort
Config.Description: UDP Game Port (If you need another port delete this entry and create a new entry with the same Container and Host port, also don't forget to change the port in your game settings file).
